Your turret seems a bit long, but other than that, nice job!
awesome! the leopard used to be my obsession... i even built one out of lego... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I love the leopard series tanks. I really think your turret is too long in relation to the body. The rear of the tank is also missing the classic German \_7 slope.

> 
> I love the leopard series tanks. I really think your turret is too long in relation to the body. The rear of the tank is also missing the classic German \_7 slope.

I purposely made the turret longer than the standard leopard to accommodate the carrying rack in the rear, along with the added electronic stability.

Also, the 7-slope is more likely to jam the turret. That's why I went with the linear surface.
